title: Bug 32770 - Java application launch shortcut error doesn't help user
description: Bug 32770 - When a user encounters an error while using the Java application launch shortcut, the error message displayed on the screen is not helpful. We need to improve the quality of the error message to provide clearer information to the user.
OB: The user encounters an error while using the Java application launch shortcut.
EB: The error message displayed on the screen should provide clear information to help the user understand the cause of the error.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a java file containing a main method. 2. Select a non-resource-based view (such as the Debug view). 3. Click 'Debug As > Java Application'.
